amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $88.2 million in funding for the Military Construction, Air Force portion of the OCO account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the paragraph providing funding for Military Construction, Air Force contained in Title IV of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 56 - 363 (Roll no. 219).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 56 - 363 (Roll no. 219).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
